data.comment: The big names in today's match at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Birmingham.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second half has started at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
An attacking Sheffield Wed player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 49, Barry Bannan converts the penalty to give Sheffield Wed a 0-1 lead.
Riley McGree is on a sub for Dan Crowley for Birmingham.
Gary Gardner for Birmingham has been booked by Peter Bankes and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 68, Aitor Karanka (Birmingham) is making a second substitution, with Jonathan Leko replacing Jeremie Bela.
At St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium, Elias Kachunga has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Jack Marriott is replacing Josh Windass for Sheffield Wed at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
In the minute 82, Aitor Karanka is making the team's third substitution at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium with Marc Roberts replacing Gary Gardner.
Sheffield Wed make their second substitution with Fisayo Dele-Bashiru replacing Elias Kachunga.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
The away team have replaced Callum Paterson with Joey Pelupessy. This is the third substitution made today by Garry Monk.
